p: The two viruses were well inhibited by antisera from ferrets immunized with A/Michigan/45/2015 and A/Brisbane/02/2018, which are northern-hemisphere influenza A(H1N1)pdm09 isolates collected in 2018–2019 and 2019–2020, respectively, with less than two-fold reduced HI titer relative to homologous virus (Table 7).
